title: Tunes of the Twenties and All That Jazz
description: In "Tunes of the Twenties" author Robert Rawlins discusses each of the 250 songs included in his previous publication "The Real Dixieland Book," taking readers backstage to share the intriguing stories associated with their publication and subsequent history. Each song has a unique story to tell, with a circumstance and a history that reflect the diversity of American culture and the dynamic of American business. Forward by Vince Giordano, music director of the TV series "Boardwalk Empire."
author: Robert Rawlins
